      • send_key

        public java.security.PublicKey send_key(javax.crypto.KeyAgreement myKeyAgreement)
                                 throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                        java.security.spec.InvalidParameterSpecException,
                                        java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
                                        java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
        To send a PublicKey to the provider and recieve their PublicKey.
        Parameters:
        myKeyAgreement - A KeyAgreement parameter that has yet to undergo the do-phase.
        Returns:
        a PublicKey recieved from the provider
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - the cryptographic algorithm is requested but is not available in the environment.
        java.security.spec.InvalidParameterSpecException - invalid parameter specifications
        java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - invalid or inappropriate algorithm parameters
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - invalid PublickKey
        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException - invalid key specifications

                                               java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
        To decode an encoded PublicKey
        Parameters:
        encPubKey - An encoded PublicKey
        Returns:
        a simple PublicKey
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - the cryptographic algorithm is requested but is not available in the environment.
        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException - invalid key specifications

      • genSharedSecret

        public byte[] genSharedSecret(javax.crypto.KeyAgreement myKeyAgreement,
                              java.security.PublicKey pubKey)
                       throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        To generate a shared secret after performing do phase of the KeyAgreement on a PublicKey.
        Parameters:
        myKeyAgreement - A KeyAgreement parameter that has yet to undergo the do-phase.
        pubKey - A PublicKey on which to perform the KeyAgreement.
        Returns:
        a byte array containing the shared secret.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - invalid PublickKey parameter
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
